contacts.heroDescription: Have questions about AI-powered expense tracking or need help? We're here to assist you with intelligent financial management.
contacts.contactDescription: Choose the most convenient way to reach out to our ExpenseTracker AI support team.

aboutPage.title: About
aboutPage.description: Your intelligent companion for tracking expenses and managing your finances with cutting-edge AI-powered insights.
aboutPage.missionDescription: At ExpenseTracker AI, we leverage cutting-edge artificial intelligence to revolutionize how individuals achieve financial wellness. Our AI analyzes your spending patterns to deliver personalized recommendations and actionable insights that lead to better budgeting and financial freedom.
aboutPage.featuresDescription: Discover the powerful features that make our AI-driven platform the smart choice for modern financial management.
aboutPage.storyParagraph1: ExpenseTracker AI was born from the vision of creating truly intelligent financial management tools. Our team of financial experts, data scientists, and technologists came together to solve a critical problem: making personal finance management smarter, more intuitive, and more effective.
aboutPage.storyParagraph2: Since our launch, we've helped thousands of users achieve better budgeting and improve their overall financial health through the power of artificial intelligence. Every feature is designed with user experience and financial wellness in mind.
aboutPage.ctaDescription: Join thousands of users who have already transformed their financial habits with ExpenseTracker AI. Start your journey towards smarter budgeting today.

featuresAbout.aiInsightsDescription: Get intelligent analysis of your spending patterns with personalized AI recommendations and automated category suggestions that learn from your behavior.
featuresAbout.smartCategorizationDescription: Let our AI automatically categorize your expenses with 99% accuracy and provide tailored recommendations to enhance your budget management effortlessly.
featuresAbout.intelligentDashboardDescription: Experience a modern, AI-enhanced interface with real-time insights, interactive financial analytics, and beautiful visualizations that make sense of your data.

guestPage.heroDescription: Track your expenses, manage your budget, and get AI-powered insights to take control of your finances with intelligent automation.

features.title: AI Insights
features.desc: Smart analysis of your spending patterns

guestPage.faqDescription: Everything you need to know about ExpenseTracker and how it can transform your financial management.

faqs.title: What is ExpenseTracker?
faqs.desc: ExpenseTracker AI is an intelligent financial management tool that uses artificial intelligence to help you monitor your spending patterns, get smart category suggestions, and receive personalized insights to improve your financial health.

faqs.title: How does the AI work?
faqs.desc: Our AI analyzes your spending data to automatically categorize expenses, detect patterns, and provide personalized recommendations. You can also ask the AI questions about your spending habits and get instant, intelligent responses.

faqs.title: Is ExpenseTracker free?
faqs.desc: Yes, ExpenseTracker offers a free plan with basic AI features including smart categorization and insights. Premium plans are available for advanced AI analytics and unlimited AI interactions.

guestPage.testimonialsDescription: Join thousands of satisfied users who have transformed their financial habits with ExpenseTracker.

testimonials.name: Sarah L.
testimonials.desc: ExpenseTracker has completely transformed my budgeting. The AI insights are incredibly helpful and I now have full control over my finances!

testimonials.name: John D.
testimonials.desc: The AI-powered insights from ExpenseTracker have helped me identify and reduce unnecessary spending. The smart categorization is amazing!

testimonials.name: Emily R.
testimonials.desc: ExpenseTracker is so intelligent and easy to use. The AI recommendations are spot-on and have genuinely improved my financial habits!
